JobTitle: Sr. Technical Program Manager II, Acquisitions
JobFullDesc: SummaryThe Uber M&A team plays a critical role in executing fast-paced and high-impact org-wide initiatives and continuously improving processes to increase the effectiveness of our products, operations, and engineering organizations including multi-billion dollar acquisitions, e.g., Postmates ($2.65B). As a Senior Technical Program Manager on the M&A team, you will structure and drive large complex cross-team technical initiatives for the company's M&A activities spanning global acquisitions, joint ventures, and divestitures as well as critical programs and various technologies. You will work alongside large multi-functional teams from operations, engineering, data science, legal, and policy in a fast-paced, hybrid technology/operations/business environment to rapidly integrate large-scale technical acquisitions.
